description.value: Scenario 1.4 for eOverdracht receiving systems. This test focuses on the negotiation phase ('aanmeldfase') and simulates the situation where the receiving system rejects the proposed stransfer of the patient (hence, there's no subsequent script for the transfer phase ('overdrachtfase').

nts:include.description: At the sending XIS, a new Task is created in status 'requested'.

nts:include.name: Notify new Task
nts:include.description: The sending XIS sends a notification to the receiving XIS because a new Task has been created with status 'requested'.

description.value: The receiving XIS should perform a read on the Task after receiving a notification that the Task has been created.
After reading the Task, the receiving XIS should perform a read operation on the advance notice Composition that is referenced on Task.input.

The receiving XIS should set the status of the Task to 'rejected' to signal that it is unable to transfer the patient at the requested date and time. This should be an update operation where the original Task is sent, with only the status element changed.
Confirm that the Task resource contains 1 Composition reference for the advance notice.
The sending XIS now sets the status of the Task to 'cancelled' to confirm to the receiving XIS that the transfer of the patient has been cancelled.
Set the eOverdracht Task resource to 'in-progress'.

nts:include.name: Notify 'in-progress' Task
nts:include.description: The sending XIS sends a notification to the receiving XIS because a new Task has been set to status 'in-progress'.

description.value: The receiving XIS should perform a read on the Task after receiving a notification that the Task has been updated.
